title: Why do people refer to the "you're bronze" statement?
body:
Even when asking a simple question you don't know, some egg says, "because youre bronze learn how to play". Is it really that hard to help someone else?

"Have any food?"
"Nah because youre bronze"
:/

replies.body:
{{champion:103}}: I dont know why this duo went vi and sion bot
{{champion:14}}: Because they have shaco jungle
{{champion:103}}: so?
{{champion:14}}: To beat stealth champs you need vi-sion.

Wrong. Theres only one  pun that can guide a person to win. And its to have

{{champion:112}} {{champion:11}}
Viktor Mid, Yi Jungle, Vi Sion botlane... It's fool proof!!!!
Didn't I saw this somewhere in Riot's facebook page?

see*

"Didn't I see this somewhere..."

The more you know ~~~~~*

> [{quoted}](name=Ahri Mechanics,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=lE5V7AbE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-02-22T04:17:47.363+0000)

> {{champion:14}}: Because they have shaco jungle

> {{champion:14}}: To beat stealth champs you need vi-sion.

{{champion:254}} {{champion:14}}  will lead to {{champion:112}} {{champion:11}} , {{champion:86}} teed!
I need to do this in a match now.
Let's do it! Add me xD
very curious how that turned out.
We never played the match unfortunately :/ He never added me.
sad...

you are so much wrong in one post
original: http://tinypic.com/r/33y49xu/8
Thanks xD I knew I had it wrong. I change it now. owo

If someone refuses to answer a genuine question by saying, "because you're Bronze," it's possible the person being asked doesn't know and is trying to hide that behind a veneer of elitism.  They can't answer, but they won't admit it because they *must be better than Bronze and don't anyone dare doubt that*.

Because most young impressionable americans think being a total dickhead is the cool thing to do, so that's what they do.  Riot pretty much lets them, and their parents don't give a flying you know what, so we're pretty much screwed :(

Pretty much this.

I think America would be a great country if it weren't for all these people who lived here.

Well it is common not to feed the bronze.

Why would anyone feed the bronze?

Oh, it's very common. See: my entire match history.

Why do my teammates do it? No fucking idea. But they do it *a lot*.
Sorry me no NA me no Americano.

that okay.
much easy fix.
put "NA" on internet
all fixed

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/218533396

It's more like...

"Do you know how to get food?"
"No because you're bronze."

lolwut

as an egg I find this offensive.

no I'm joking but yes this comment does happen but you just have to let it roll off your back because either 1) they're right or 2) they're just mad and can't blame themselves.

{{champion:238}} : I'm roaming top
{{champion:86}} : DEMACIA?
{{champion:238}}: you have 20 hp don't go in before I do.
{{champion:86}} : (Goes in right before zed got out of bush) DEMACIA!!!!!!!!
{{champion:238}} : OMG! You Bronze!!
{{champion:86}}: (dies) DE..MA.CIA...
{{champion:59}} (Falls to knees) DEMACIAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!
Had a ranked game the other day with a guy who was plat last season.       He fed worse then a bronze 3.

or when you make a suggestion like "hey, you may want to consider rushing abyssal" and they just start raging like "stfu you frikin bronzie you have no clue how to play go back to bronze"

seriously people, chill.  its just a suggestion.

God. I've played against a gold we had the same champ, he was rushing something and was insulting me for my item choice because i was a bronzie (i wasnt even lvl 30 at that time lol), didnt answer and destroyed him.
Because they haven't any decent argument other than reasserting their own egos because they weren't good enough for pros.
Because saying unranked doesn't exactly sound right as insult.
It gets old hearing that phrase. My only reply is "You're also in bronze".

ur unranked

u wouldn't b able 2 understand
Sometimes it just takes too long to explain and/or the bronzie in question is heavily defending his blatantly wrong arguement. Such as Yi is OP no ifs ands or buts.

Anyone else notice how "because you're bronze" replies are usually fom unranked people...
Its a consipracy

I'm chilling out in bronze right now cause I'm not playing much ranked. The people who are actually stuck here tend to be complete idiots. If you have >100 ranked games and are in bronze, you probably don't know much about the game.
What if you just don't play ranked very often because of all the bullshit that goes on in ranked.

> if you have >100 ranked games and are in bronze

Honestly, I don't give two shits about the 8 year olds who are playing league on mommy's macbook. I'm just playing Kha'Zix and Kalista till I know I won't have to carry my little scrubs through these games.

because many players such as myself are unranked or in bronze and must find a way to bronzify other players so it's more okay for them to be in bronze. Misery loves company.

That's why I never complain about bad teams. I just cook some popcorn and laugh at their bronziness. If I stand outside a team fight doing nothing, I'm not trolling, you did something stupid and I'm stuck rofl'ing.

I can clearly see this in real life.

"I deserve to get gold!!"
"*But you came 3rd dumbass"*
"STFU NOOB!!"
*"STFU BRONZE"*

"Why are you stuck in Bronze?"
"Becuase you're Bronze."
I've seen that so much.

>"Have any food?"
>"Nah because youre bronze"


Now that's one I haven't heard... that's just rude :/
